name: Petunia
description: Annual plants that bloom profusely and are great for seasonal color.

wateringTask.instructions: Water regularly to keep the soil evenly moist.

userNotes.name: Petunia
userNotes.noteText: Remove spent flowers to encourage new blooms.

name: Coneflower
description: A native perennial with beautiful purple flowers that blooms in summer.

wateringTask.instructions: Water deeply once a week during dry spells.

userNotes.name: Coneflower
userNotes.noteText: Watch these purple beauties paint the summer sky.

name: Daffodil
description: A classic bulb plant with bright yellow or white flowers that blooms in early spring.

wateringTask.instructions: Water sparingly when actively growing.

userNotes.name: Coneflower
userNotes.noteText: Daffodils: the cheerful trumpets of spring!

name: Knock Out Rose
description: A low-maintenance shrub rose that blooms continuously throughout the growing season.

wateringTask.instructions: Water deeply once a week, more during hot periods.

userNotes.name: Knock Out Rose
userNotes.noteText: Prepare for knockout performances all season long.

name: Boston Fern
description: A popular indoor foliage plant known for its graceful, arching fronds.

wateringTask.instructions: Keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged.

userNotes.name: Boston Fern
userNotes.noteText: Boston Fern: where elegance meets resilience.

name: Windmill Palm
description: A hardy palm tree that can tolerate New England's climate and adds a tropical touch.

wateringTask.instructions: Water regularly to keep soil evenly moist but not waterlogged.

userNotes.name: Windmill Palm
userNotes.noteText: Feel the tropical vibes sway with every breeze.

name: Weeping Fig
description: A common indoor tree with glossy leaves that is easy to care for.

wateringTask.instructions: Water when the top inch of soil feels dry.

userNotes.name: Weeping Fig
userNotes.noteText: Easy-going Weeping Fig: green thumb approved.

name: Echeveria
description: A popular succulent plant with rosette-shaped leaves that store water.

wateringTask.instructions: Water sparingly but deeply when soil is dry.

userNotes.name: Echeveria
userNotes.noteText: Echeveria: thrives on a little neglect.

name: Inkberry
description: A native evergreen shrub with dark green foliage, ideal for landscaping.

wateringTask.instructions: Water deeply once a week during dry spells.

userNotes.name: Inkberry
userNotes.noteText: Inkberry: the dark horse of the garden.

name: New Dawn Rose
description: A vigorous climbing rose with pale pink flowers, perfect for trellises or arbors.

wateringTask.instructions: Water deeply once a week, more during hot periods.

userNotes.name: New Dawn Rose
userNotes.noteText: New Dawn Rose: reaching new heights of grace.

name: Marigold
description: Annual flowers known for their bright and cheerful blooms.

wateringTask.instructions: Water regularly, allowing soil to dry out slightly between waterings.

userNotes.name: Marigold
userNotes.noteText: Marigold: spreading sunshine wherever they go.

name: Lavender
description: A fragrant perennial herb with aromatic foliage and purple flowers.

wateringTask.instructions: Water sparingly once established; prefers well-drained soil.

name: Tulip
description: A classic bulb flower available in a variety of colors.

wateringTask.instructions: Water sparingly while actively growing; allow soil to dry out between waterings.

userNotes.name: Tulip
userNotes.noteText: Tulips: the stars of a colorful spring show.

name: Hydrangea
description: A popular flowering shrub with large, showy blooms that change color with soil pH.

wateringTask.instructions: Keep soil consistently moist, especially during hot weather.

name: Snake Plant
description: A popular indoor succulent with upright leaves that resemble snakeskin.

wateringTask.instructions: Water sparingly; allow soil to dry out between waterings.

name: Peace Lily
description: A popular indoor plant with glossy green leaves and white spathe-like flowers.

wateringTask.instructions: Keep soil consistently moist but not waterlogged.

name: Blueberry
description: A deciduous shrub that produces edible berries in summer.

wateringTask.instructions: Keep soil evenly moist, especially during fruit development.

name: Morning Glory
description: A fast-growing annual vine with colorful trumpet-shaped flowers.

wateringTask.instructions: Water regularly to promote growth and flowering.

userNotes.name: Morning Glory
userNotes.noteText: Rise and shine with these vibrant trumpeters!

name: Basil
description: A popular culinary herb used in a variety of dishes.

wateringTask.instructions: Water consistently; avoid overhead watering to prevent fungal issues.

userNotes.name: Basil
userNotes.noteText: Basil: the secret ingredient to culinary bliss.

name: Tomato
description: A popular vegetable plant grown for its juicy fruits.

wateringTask.instructions: Water consistently to keep soil evenly moist.

userNotes.name: Tomato
userNotes.noteText: Tomatoes: the crown jewels of the vegetable patch.
